Defs/ResearchProjectDef[defName="CrudeLimbs"]
CrudeLimbs Crude Limbs Basic, uncomfortable, and ineffective, but better than nothing. Can now craft shoddy limb replacements at a Crafting Spot. 500 Neolithic
ClassicStart
Chirurgie 1 2
Artificial Limbs <-->
Defs/ResearchProjectDef[defName="ArtificialLimbs"]
ArtificialLimbs Artificial Limbs Still quite unrefined, but better than the shoddy limbs that came before. Artificial limbs can now be crafted at a Crafting Spot. 750 Neolithic
CrudeLimbs
ClassicStart
Chirurgie 2 2
Mechanical Limbs <-->
Defs/ResearchProjectDef[defName="MechanicalLimbs"]
MechanicalLimbs Mechanical Limbs Intricately crafted limbs with many pulleys and gears. While these are a great improvement, the mechanics of the human body are tough to reproduce. Mechanical limbs can be crafted at a Fueled Smithy. 800 Medieval
Smithing
ArtificialLimbs
ClassicStart
